Rent us

We regularly hold weddings, birthday and farewell parties, corporate product launches, team meetings, company BBQ parties, colleague reunions and other great events.

The venue

Zarah's venue consists of five areas which can be booked individually or together for private and corporate events.

The Front area The yard Back area & hallway Meeting room Terrace

The Front area is 100sqm and can hold up to 80 people standing and 30people sitting. It is a beautiful airy space with very high ceilings and large windows to the street and the yard.

The yard is 50sqm in space with a tree in the middle and a small glass roof on one side in summer and a full glass roof plus gas heaters in winter. It holds up to 60people standing and 30 people sitting.

The back are is 30sqm in space, holding up to 40people standing and 20 people sitting. suitable for a small gathering of friends or a business dinner.

The meeting room is on the second floor right above the back area. It is 30sqm in space and has a large wooden table where 20-30 people can be seated. It is very suitable for a business meeting, beeing equiped with a bprojector, a white board and a printer.

The terrace is 38sqm and a very beautiful space, overlooking everything. You can organize a beatiful birthday party on our terrace!

Event inquiery

Small team meeting? Birthday BBQ? Big wedding party? Corporate event? We are very happy to host your event at Zarah!
